00025 short int tocost(double d, int n, int default_cost) {
00026   if (d == 0.0) return default_cost;
00027   static const short max = +32767;
00028   static const short min = -32767;
00029   return static_cast<short>(_max(_min(
00030                                      -n * d,
00031                                      static_cast<double>(max)),
00032                                  static_cast<double>(min)) );
00033 }
00034 
00035 void copy(const char *src, const char *dst) {
00036   std::cout << "copying " << src << " to " <<  dst << std::endl;
00037   Mmap<char> mmap;
00038   CHECK_DIE(mmap.open(src)) << mmap.what();
00039   std::ofstream ofs(dst, std::ios::binary|std::ios::out);
00040   CHECK_DIE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << dst;
00041   ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(mmap.begin()), mmap.size());
00042   ofs.close();
00043 }

00045 class DictionaryGenerator {
00046  private:
00047   static void gencid_bos(const std::string &bos_feature,
00048                          DictionaryRewriter *rewrite,
00049                          ContextID *cid) {
00050     std::string ufeature, lfeature, rfeature;
00051     rewrite->rewrite2(bos_feature, &ufeature, &lfeature, &rfeature);
00052     cid->addBOS(lfeature.c_str(), rfeature.c_str());
00053   }
00054 
00055   static void gencid(const char *filename,
00056                      DictionaryRewriter *rewrite,
00057                      ContextID *cid) {
00058     std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00059     CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << filename;
00060     char line[BUF_SIZE];
00061     std::cout << "reading " << filename << " ... " << std::flush;
00062     size_t num = 0;
00063     std::string feature, ufeature, lfeature, rfeature;
00064     char *col[8];
00065     while (ifs.getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00066       const size_t n = tokenizeCSV(line, col, 5);
00067       CHECK_DIE(n == 5) << "format error: " << line;
00068       feature = col[4];
00069       rewrite->rewrite2(feature, &ufeature, &lfeature, &rfeature);
00070       cid->add(lfeature.c_str(), rfeature.c_str());
00071       ++num;
00072     }
00073     std::cout << num << std::endl;
00074     ifs.close();
00075   }
00076 
00077   static bool genmatrix(const char *filename,
00078                         const ContextID &cid,
00079                         DecoderFeatureIndex *fi,
00080                         int factor,
00081                         int default_cost) {
00082     std::ofstream ofs(filename);
00083     CHECK_DIE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << filename;
00084 
00085     LearnerPath path;
00086     LearnerNode rnode;
00087     LearnerNode lnode;
00088     rnode.stat = lnode.stat = MECAB_NOR_NODE;
00089     rnode.rpath = &path;
00090     lnode.lpath = &path;
00091     path.lnode = &lnode;
00092     path.rnode = &rnode;
00093 
00094     const std::map<std::string, int> &left =  cid.left_ids();
00095     const std::map<std::string, int> &right = cid.right_ids();
00096 
00097     CHECK_DIE(left.size())  << "left id size is empty";
00098     CHECK_DIE(right.size()) << "right id size is empty";
00099 
00100     ofs << right.size() << ' ' << left.size() << std::endl;
00101 
00102     size_t l = 0;
00103     for (std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator rit = right.begin();
00104          rit != right.end();
00105          ++rit) {
00106       ++l;
00107       progress_bar("emitting matrix      ", l+1, right.size());
00108       for (std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator lit = left.begin();
00109            lit != left.end();
00110            ++lit) {
00111         path.rnode->wcost = 0;
00112         fi->buildBigramFeature(&path, rit->first.c_str(), lit->first.c_str());
00113         fi->calcCost(&path);
00114         ofs << rit->second << ' ' << lit->second << ' '
00115             << tocost(path.cost, factor, default_cost) << std::endl;
00116       }
00117     }
00118 
00119     return true;
00120   }
00121 
00122   static void gendic(const char* ifile,
00123                      const char* ofile,
00124                      const CharProperty &property,
00125                      DictionaryRewriter *rewrite,
00126                      const ContextID &cid,
00127                      DecoderFeatureIndex *fi,
00128                      bool unk,
00129                      int factor,
00130                      int default_cost) {
00131     std::ifstream ifs(ifile);
00132     CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << ifile;
00133 
00134     std::ofstream ofs(ofile);
00135     CHECK_DIE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << ofile;
00136 
00137     std::string w, feature, ufeature, lfeature, rfeature;
00138     int cost, lid, rid;
00139 
00140     std::cout <<  "emitting " << ofile << " ... " << std::flush;
00141 
00142     LearnerPath path;
00143     LearnerNode rnode;
00144     LearnerNode lnode;
00145     rnode.stat  = lnode.stat = MECAB_NOR_NODE;
00146     rnode.rpath = &path;
00147     lnode.lpath = &path;
00148     path.lnode  = &lnode;
00149     path.rnode  = &rnode;
00150 
00151     char line[BUF_SIZE];
00152     char *col[8];
00153     size_t num = 0;
00154 
00155     while (ifs.getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00156       const size_t n = tokenizeCSV(line, col, 5);
00157       CHECK_DIE(n == 5) << "format error: " << line;
00158 
00159       w = std::string(col[0]);
00160       lid = std::atoi(col[1]);
00161       rid = std::atoi(col[2]);
00162       cost = std::atoi(col[3]);
00163       feature = std::string(col[4]);
00164 
00165       rewrite->rewrite2(feature, &ufeature, &lfeature, &rfeature);
00166       lid = cid.lid(lfeature.c_str());
00167       rid = cid.rid(rfeature.c_str());
00168 
00169       CHECK_DIE(lid > 0) << "CID is not found for " << lfeature;
00170       CHECK_DIE(rid > 0) << "CID is not found for " << rfeature;
00171 
00172       if (unk) {
00173         int c = property.id(w.c_str());
00174         CHECK_DIE(c >= 0) << "unknown property [" << w << "]";
00175         path.rnode->char_type = (unsigned char)c;
00176       } else {
00177         size_t mblen;
00178         CharInfo cinfo = property.getCharInfo(w.c_str(),
00179                                               w.c_str() + w.size(), &mblen);
00180         path.rnode->char_type = cinfo.default_type;
00181       }
00182 
00183       fi->buildUnigramFeature(&path, ufeature.c_str());
00184       fi->calcCost(&rnode);
00185       CHECK_DIE(escape_csv_element(&w)) << "invalid character found: " << w;
00186 
00187       ofs << w << ',' << lid << ',' << rid << ','
00188           << tocost(rnode.wcost, factor, default_cost)
00189           << ',' << feature << std::endl;
00190       ++num;
00191     }
00192 
00193     std::cout << num << std::endl;
00194   }
00195 
00196  public:
00197 
00198   static int run(int argc, char **argv) {
00199     static const MeCab::Option long_options[] = {
00200       { "dicdir",  'd',  ".",   "DIR", "set DIR as dicdir(default \".\" )" },
00201       { "outdir",  'o',  ".",   "DIR", "set DIR as output dir" },
00202       { "model",   'm',  0,     "FILE",   "use FILE as model file" },
00203       { "version", 'v',  0,   0,  "show the version and exit"  },
00204       { "training-algorithm", 'a',  "crf",    "(crf|hmm)",
00205         "set training algorithm" },
00206       { "default-emission-cost", 'E', "4000", "INT",
00207         "set default emission cost for HMM" },
00208       { "default-transition-cost", 'T', "4000", "INT",
00209         "set default transition cost for HMM" },
00210       { "help",    'h',  0,   0,  "show this help and exit."      },
00211       { 0, 0, 0, 0 }
00212     };
00213 
00214     Param param;
00215 
00216     if (!param.open(argc, argv, long_options)) {
00217       std::cout << param.what() << "\n\n" <<  COPYRIGHT
00218                 << "\ntry '--help' for more information." << std::endl;
00219       return -1;
00220     }
00221 
00222     if (!param.help_version()) return 0;
00223 
00224     ContextID cid;
00225     DecoderFeatureIndex fi;
00226     DictionaryRewriter rewrite;
00227 
00228     const std::string dicdir = param.get<std::string>("dicdir");
00229     const std::string outdir = param.get<std::string>("outdir");
00230     const std::string model = param.get<std::string>("model");
00231 
00232 #define DCONF(file) create_filename(dicdir, std::string(file)).c_str()
00233 #define OCONF(file) create_filename(outdir, std::string(file)).c_str()
00234 
00235     CHECK_DIE(param.load(DCONF(DICRC)))
00236         << "no such file or directory: " << DCONF(DICRC);
00237 
00238     std::string charset;
00239     {
00240       Dictionary dic;
00241       CHECK_DIE(dic.open(DCONF(SYS_DIC_FILE), "r"));
00242       charset = dic.charset();
00243       CHECK_DIE(!charset.empty());
00244     }
00245 
00246     int default_emission_cost = 0;
00247     int default_transition_cost = 0;
00248 
00249     std::string type = param.get<std::string>("training-algorithm");
00250     toLower(&type);
00251 
00252     if (type == "hmm") {
00253       default_emission_cost =
00254           param.get<int>("default-emission-cost");
00255       default_transition_cost =
00256           param.get<int>("default-transition-cost");
00257       CHECK_DIE(default_transition_cost > 0)
00258           << "default transition cost must be > 0";
00259       CHECK_DIE(default_emission_cost > 0)
00260           << "default transition cost must be > 0";
00261       param.set("identity-template", 1);
00262     }
00263 
00264     CharProperty property;
00265     CHECK_DIE(property.open(param));
00266     property.set_charset(charset.c_str());
00267 
00268     const std::string bos = param.get<std::string>("bos-feature");
00269     const int factor = param.get<int>("cost-factor");
00270 
00271     std::vector<std::string> dic;
00272     enum_csv_dictionaries(dicdir.c_str(), &dic);
00273 
00274     {
00275       CHECK_DIE(dicdir != outdir) <<
00276           "output directory = dictionary directory! "
00277           "Please specify different directory.";
00278       CHECK_DIE(!outdir.empty()) << "output directory is empty";
00279       CHECK_DIE(!model.empty()) << "model file is empty";
00280       CHECK_DIE(fi.open(param)) << fi.what();
00281       CHECK_DIE(factor > 0)   << "cost factor needs to be positive value";
00282       CHECK_DIE(!bos.empty()) << "bos-feature is empty";
00283       CHECK_DIE(dic.size()) << "no dictionary is found in " << dicdir;
00284       CHECK_DIE(rewrite.open(DCONF(REWRITE_FILE)));
00285     }
00286 
00287     gencid_bos(bos, &rewrite, &cid);
00288     gencid(DCONF(UNK_DEF_FILE), &rewrite, &cid);
00289 
00290     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = dic.begin();
00291          it != dic.end();
00292          ++it) {
00293       gencid(it->c_str(), &rewrite, &cid);
00294     }
00295 
00296     std::cout << "emitting "
00297               << OCONF(LEFT_ID_FILE) << "/ "
00298               << OCONF(RIGHT_ID_FILE) << std::endl;
00299 
00300     cid.build();
00301     cid.save(OCONF(LEFT_ID_FILE), OCONF(RIGHT_ID_FILE));
00302 
00303     gendic(DCONF(UNK_DEF_FILE), OCONF(UNK_DEF_FILE), property,
00304            &rewrite, cid, &fi, true, factor, default_emission_cost);
00305 
00306     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = dic.begin();
00307          it != dic.end();
00308          ++it) {
00309       std::string file =  *it;
00310       remove_pathname(&file);
00311       gendic(it->c_str(), OCONF(file.c_str()), property,
00312              &rewrite, cid, &fi, false, factor, default_emission_cost);
00313     }
00314 
00315     genmatrix(OCONF(MATRIX_DEF_FILE), cid, &fi,
00316               factor, default_transition_cost);
00317 
00318     copy(DCONF(CHAR_PROPERTY_DEF_FILE), OCONF(CHAR_PROPERTY_DEF_FILE));
00319     copy(DCONF(REWRITE_FILE), OCONF(REWRITE_FILE));
00320     copy(DCONF(DICRC), OCONF(DICRC));
00321 
00322     if (type == "crf")
00323       copy(DCONF(FEATURE_FILE), OCONF(FEATURE_FILE));
00324 
00325 #undef OCONF
00326 #undef DCONF
00327 
00328     std::cout <<  "\ndone!\n";
00329 
00330     return 0;
00331   }
00332 };
00333 }
00334 
00335 // export functions
00336 int mecab_dict_gen(int argc, char **argv) {
00337   return MeCab::DictionaryGenerator::run(argc, argv);
00338 }
